title: Rin.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Rin. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Hey Rin

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Hi Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Rin, you seem new here

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I am, I think I got here a month ago
it's hard to tell, I haven't seen a calander in a while
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Rin.AddToEscapeQuest]]
[[Not really...|Rin.EndDialog]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
What are you thinking about Rin?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
...
Emma I'm kinda tired and don't wanna talk right now

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
ok

[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Hi Rin

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
How long have you been doing this crystal mining?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
I dunno, I can't seem to remember when I got here
I haven't seen a calender, I was counting the days for a while
but it just depressed me too much to think about

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Aren't you going to get even more depressed if you don't even know what day it is?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Does it even matter?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Fair enough
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I used to be a reporter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
You wrote for a paper?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Yeah I did
I was good at it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
What did you write about?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I mainly did financial writing
banks and stuff

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
hmm...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
It doesn't matter now
all that's gone
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
You said you wrote about banks and things

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
yeah, why are you curious

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
well that's the reason I ended up here
my family worked on bank owned land and we had a bad harvest
so, they sold me off

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Oh, oh dear
Sadly, that's pretty common
It's so common the banks expect it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
really?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Yeah, in some cases if a farm is profitable enough they'll "adjust" the interest rates
so that suddenly a farm isn't making enough money for them

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
...
I think that's what happened with ours
we had a few safe years and then for some reason our "interest rate" changed
we worked so hard back then, and it was for nothing?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
well, yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
....
<<CampEventController upgradeSwordLevel>>
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_talking>>

title: Rin.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Does the gruel taste different today?
Actually, what are they feeding us?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
It's some combination of grains and protein
I wanna say it's like soy, corn, and oats?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
I eat every drop of it, even though I hate it
I felt so low, licking the bowl clean

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I do the same, they never feed us enough.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
If they fed us more, wouldn't we be stronger?
wouldn't we bring up more of those fucking crystals?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
What's probably happened is someone, somewhere, worked out the math
between how long we last, how much ore we refine, and how much we cost
and calculate the exact amount to feed us and not a grain more

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
not a grain more, huh
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day7.Morning.Start

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_talking>>

title: Rin.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
You think we have a chance of, you know, escaping?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I don't... 
shh
don't talk like that

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
what?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
never ever bring that up!
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
So Rin
When you were a writer

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
And you reported on the banks
what kind of people worked there?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
why do you want to know?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
I don't know. I always was curious 
they seemed to hold so much over our lives
all I saw of them were the enforcers that'd come every few months

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
hmmm
I did meet a few bankers
they invited me to their estate once to celebrate buying some other company
dreadfully boring stuff
one of the things that struck me was they have more money than they could ever spend
and I mean that literally
They'd all have teams of horses and full polo teams, and they'd just pit them against each other

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Polo?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Yeah, and, uh
pit fights too

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Pit fights?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
yeah fight to the death shit. two slaves enter
one survives

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
...
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day9.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Rin. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Rin

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Emma
You want more fucked up banker stories?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
I dunno
sure
did any of them you talk to ever bring up
I dunno, enslaving people?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Well, once, they complained that the ones they were getting were "underweight"
because, ya see, weight was how they determined value
along with stuff like intelligence or whatever

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
how..did they determine intelligence?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
They used to have a bunch of tests they'd run
for intellect or whatever
for every right answer they'd get a point
problem is that everyone used the same tests, because they were "objective"
but then the answers to em started getting passed around, right

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
so folks got perfect scores?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
yeah. was a real problem, becaues that drove up values
so they started writing different tests, and they made em harder and harder
but then nobody was able to pass any of them
so that plummeted the values

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
what did they do?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
Fuck if I know, that was a while ago
you can't put a price on someone
but they did it anyway
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Rin_default_talking>>

title: Rin.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
I feel lost
at the bottom of the world
I can't go back into that cave anymore

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
Rin?
Me either

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
How do you keep going?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_silent>>
I dunno
ever since I came here I just started supressing myself
and I cleaved myself into a separate person
someone who doesn't react to anything
words, ideas, everything is different for them
the old me may never come out again
but the new me, this one is for enduring

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rin_default_talking>>
...
yeah I feel like I'm doing the same thing
a separate self
[[....|Rin.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Rin.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Rin>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Rin.EndDialog
body: Empty Text
